channel.title: Contacts on Jasper Slingsby

item.title: Get in touch
item.description: The easiest way to get hold of me is to drop me an email using myfirstname_at_saeon.ac.za. Note that I haven’t up this email submission form properly yet, so it probably doesn’t work! I’m not much of a social media person either, so none of the links below work :P
